amendment.description: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 116-289 to add businesses owned by LGBTQ individuals to the Agency's small business outreach plan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 116-289 to add businesses owned by LGBTQ individuals to the Agency's small business outreach plan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Rouda.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
